title: Disappearing Topic
content:
That’s odd. I just helped ID this font, and suddenly the posts have vanished. This isn’t the first time this has happened. Hmmm. Strange.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091214060613im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Siddhartha_5176.jpg)

PS: I called it as being close to Anzeigen Grotesk, but actually AT Aura: [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/aura/at-aura/](http://web.archive.org/web/20091214060613/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/aura/at-aura/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/aura/at-aura/")
author: malbright

comments.content:
Ignoring the spam posted after the opening post, since you already know the answer to your SIDDHARTHA question (Aura) why do you want to post it agin?

If you can’t find your earlier post, it’s usually because one of the Moderators here changed the title to be more descriptive. If we left every ’What’s This Font?’ subject line we’d never be able to tell any of them apart :)

- Mike Yanega
Actually, there were a bunch of posts a week or so ago that just vanished — I noticed that a couple of IDs I made disappeared as well.
Plus my FAQ page has become un-sticky so it’s burried somewhere in between old posts. No news from the powers that be yet about what’s happening. :^/
Grf. You go away for a few days, and things get messed up badly.... :-(
